name: SaudiCalendar
0:
”Alexa, open Saudi Calendar”
”Alexa, ask Saudi Calendar to tell me the upcoming events”
”Alexa, open Saudi Calendar and tell me the events happening next month”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saudi calendar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Discover an exciting range of activities and Saudi destinations. Experience the thrill of Riyadh Seasons, the world's largest lifestyle festival, with a huge variety of entertainment and events for the whole family.

Enjoy the temperate climate of the Red Sea for winter sun, sand, and marine adventure. Explore Saudi's national parks and ward off the evening chill with a roaring campfire beneath the glorious desert stars. However you like to spend your winter, Saudi has an exciting experience waiting for you.
